content.title: Intro
content.content:
1970
Preceded by
1970
1971
Year
1972
Followed by
1972

Tolkien-related events that took place in 1971.

content.title: January
content.content:
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 319.
18 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 319a.
25 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 320.

content.title: February
content.content:
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 321.
12 - Actor Scott Menville is born.
13 - Rachel Tolkien is born.
22 - Producer Callum Greene is born.
25 - Actor Sean Astin is born.

content.title: March
content.content:
5 - Actor Yuri Lowenthal is born.
18 - Tolkien writes letter 322.

content.title: April
content.content: 7 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Randy Trimmer.

content.title: May
content.content:
19 - Actor Grant George is born.
26 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Dorothy Wood.

content.title: June
content.content:
2 - J.R.R. Tolkien begins writing letter 323.
4 - J.R.R. Tolkien begins writing letter 324.
10 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to "My dear Ladies".
21 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Brian Miller.

content.title: July
content.content:
17 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 325.
18 - Actress Sarah McLeod is born.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 326.
? - Shadows of Heaven: Religion and Fantasy in the Fiction of C.S. Lewis, Charles Williams and J.R.R. Tolkien is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
17 - Linguist Helge Fauskanger is born.
22 - Actor Richard Armitage is born.
25 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 327.

content.title: September
content.content:
1 - Actor Dave Wittenberg is born.
3-6 - Mythcon 2.

content.title: October
content.content:
28 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Joy Hill.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 329, a draft only.

content.title: November
content.content:
1 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 330.
8 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 330a.
16 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Miss Fay Darrington.
29 - Edith Tolkien dies after a short but severe illness attributed to an inflamed gall-bladder.
29 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 331.

content.title: December
content.content:
? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 331a.
11 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to George and Moira Sayer.
19 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 331b.
20 - Actor Michael Yurchak is born.
24 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Eileen Elgar.
25 - Attacks of Taste, with a contribution by J.R.R. Tolkien, is published.
26 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Joy Hill.
28 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to W.B. Crouch of the Southern Cigar, Co..

? - Tolkien and The Silmarillion is published.
? - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to his brother (the Letter to Hilary Tolkien letter).
? - In Autumn, J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 328.
Years
1968 1969 1970 1971 1972 1973 1974
